turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like you to order me a coffee from starbucks please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure which starbuck are you near?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ummm order from the one on North Charles street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what kind of coffee drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take the Caffe Americano please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The largest one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great what milk do you want with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok well it looks like the whole milk actually is not available right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well that sucks what is?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, cocunut, soy and 2 percent milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess I'll take the coconut then please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great well I'll order it right now if that's all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep thats it thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok its ordered, and will be ready at the starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh and the receipt will be sent to you're phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gotcha thanks again bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem , bye.
